name: Groudon ex
author: Ryo Ueda

poke_body.name: Frenzy
poke_body.effect: As long as your opponent has Kyogre, Kyogre ex, Rayquaza, or Rayquaza ex in play, Groudon ex’s attacks do 40 more damage to the Defending Pokémon (before applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Mix-Up
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent discards the top card from his or her deck.

attacks.name: Earthquake
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage to each of your Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: When Pokémon-ex has been Knocked Out, your opponent takes 2 Prize cards.
